title: Absolute temperature as speed of molecules doubles

content.question: When the average speed of the molecules in a certain sample of gas is v, the absolute temperature of the gas is T. If the average speed of the molecules is doubled to 2v, what is the new absolute temperature?

topic.text: 9.1: Kinetic Theory of Temperature and Pressure

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
